page.title: 03BUILTH (WEST)HOME LIFE.
page.content: Many people have lived in Builth all their lives,although,there are many people who have moved from larger towns and cities.A lot of elderly people live here,they moved to Builth when they retired.The community is growing rapidly,although Builth could do with a lot more shops,as shopping in Builth is expensive,and not very good for bulk shopping and variety, when bulk shopping is needed,most people go to larger towns. But,the problem with going to larger towns,is the lack of public transport.Most elderly people rely on public transport for visiting,and shopping are the only way to get around. The facilities for younger people are poor.At the moment we are in need of a new school.
